'''Goulash''' is a [[Food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Goulash is obtainable by completing the {{Quest|Ah, Fresh Meat!}}

Goulash reduces the rate of [[Sheer Cold]] accumulation. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Recipe==
{{Recipe
|type = Cooking
|Chilled Meat = 2
|Carrot = 2
|Tomato = 1
|sort = Chilled Meat;Carrot;Tomato
}}

===Manual Cooking===
{{Manual Cooking}}

==Trivia==
* Goulash is [[Harris]]'s version of an ancient recipe that was discovered by a group of adventurers who went into "the mountains," presumably [[Dragonspine]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Ah, Fresh Meat!}}</ref>
* To celebrate [[Bennett]]'s birthday in 2022, the [[Teyvat Food Notes]] published a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/20308 real-life recipe] for Goulash.
* Learning how to make Goulash awards the {{Achievement|Glutton for Goulash}}.
* {{Mail Attachments by Category List|Delicious Goulash}}
